hidden_abilites: Movement speed increases and throws up to 4 bombs during regular attacks.
Splash range of large bombs increase and damage increases by 150%.
Upon first appearing, greatly increases movement and attack speed of ally units for a period of time and casts a barrier that defends against 99% of damage for a short period.
When killed, has an increased chance to revive on the spot.
description.skill2: Increase movement speed of undead unit in PvP (0.4%, 0.8%, 1.2%, 1.6%, 2%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Bomb Unit ]
